ESolar Monitor is a monitoring widget for solar power systems using the Enphase Enlighten® service.
Enlighten is a registered trademark of Enphase Energy. This application is not affiliated with or endorsed by Enphase Energy.
Choose the amount of time between periodic updates.

From your Enlighten system settings, you must check "Allow visitors to my system" and provide the last portion of the public access link in the above box.
For example, given the public link of "http://enlighten.enphaseenergy.com/public/systems/1a2B3d4E", you would provide "1a2B3d4E" above.
